queries.query:
from(bucket: "ProjetoFinal")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "nascer_do_sol_str")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "ProjetoFinal")
  |> range(start: today())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sun_info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "por_do_sol_str")
  |> last()
